title._content: Image taken from page 103 of 'The Peak Guide; containing the topographical, statistical, and general history of Buxton, Chatsworth, Edensor, Castlteon [sic], Bakewell, Haddon, Matlock, and Cromford; with an introduction ... Edited by T. Noble'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Peak Guide; containing the topographical, statistical, and general history of Buxton, Chatsworth, Edensor, Castlteon [sic], Bakewell, Haddon, Matlock, and Cromford; with an introduction ... Edited by T. Noble" Author: GLOVER, Stephen - of Derby Contributor: NOBLE, Thomas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10358.f.2." Page: 103 Place of Publishing: Derby Date of Publishing: 1830 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001441022 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
